cast.name: 迈克尔·莫斯利 Michael J. Mosley

this_title: The Story Of Science: Power, Proof And Passion
trans_title: 科学的故事：权力、证据与激情
introduction: 1/6. What Is Out There?How we came to understand our planet was not at the centre of everything in the cosmos.第1集：宇宙是什么人类是如何认识到地球不是宇宙的中心的。2/6. What is the World Made of?How atomic theories and concepts of quantum physics underpin modern technology.第2集：世界由什么构成原子理论和量子物理是如何支撑现代技术的。3/6. How Did We Get Here?How scientists came to explain the diversity of life on earth.第3集：...
chinese_title: 科学的故事：权力、证据与激情
foreign_title: The Story Of Science: Power, Proof And Passion
